tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr. Sudhir N. Pai (Orthopedic surgeon) for Vascular Necrosis of Hip Joint
Excellent. He is very polite and explains the issue very well. Its a very good experience. My slip disc issue is improving. Thanks to Dr. Sudhir.
Good follow up too

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very nice doctor. highly qualified. very good diagnosis. Our all family members visit this doctor. very happy about the services. I strongly recommend to everyone.

review: Gathered that Doctor normally does not visit Trustwell Hospital on Saturdays. Since we had booked through Practo, Doctor made a visit. Kindly check and update so that it will be helpful for future appointments on Saturday. Doctor was very helpful, explained in simple terms. His reassuring words and simplicity were exemplary. Hats off
